desc.basic: Name of the document to be displayed in Ribbon. [e.g. wrd02_Art - Microsoft Word]
desc.detailed: Document name which is shown in the central top area of the Ribbon, is to be mentioned here.

desc.basic: An HTML file, which will be used to configure the initial state of Word Document Area.
desc.detailed: An HTML file, which will be used to configure the Word Document Area in SIMS, is required to be uploaded here. This file can be generated by exporting original word document as an HTML file. If HTML has embeded resources then replace these resources with {#resourceName.extension#} e.g {#w02h3Dobry.jpg#} or {#treeContent.xml#} or {#initDoc.json#}. resourceName.extension must be the file name which you are going to upload.

rendererProperties.placeholder: Drop HTML file here to upload

desc.basic: Images (if any) which are part of the HTML file used to configure the initial state of Word Document Area.
desc.detailed: Image(s) which will be used to configure the Word Doc Area in SIMS, is/are required to be uploaded here. These images are generated while exporting the original word document as HTML file.

desc.basic:
ID of the HTML element on which caret needs to be placed at the launch of simulation. [e.g. para1 in

lorem ipsum

]
desc.detailed: In order to place cursor at a particular position, ID of the parent HTML element needs to be mentioned here.

desc.basic: Caret position relative to the start of the HTML element. [e.g. 10]
desc.detailed: Value of caret position at which the cursor needs to be placed at start of the task, relative to its parent HTML element.

desc.basic: Word Document preview image, which is seen on hovering over application icon in Task Bar.
desc.detailed: When a user hovers mouse over the application icon in the task bar, an image is shown as a tool tip. That image has to be uploaded here.

desc.basic:
ID of the HTML element on which caret needs to be placed, before inserting picture. [e.g. para2 in

lorem ipsum

.]
desc.detailed: In order to validate placement of caret at a particular position, ID of the parent HTML element needs to be mentioned here

desc.basic: Caret position relative to the start of the HTML element. [e.g. 11]
desc.detailed: Value of caret position at which the cursor needs to be placed before inserting picture, relative to its parent HTML element.

desc.basic: An XML file which is used to configure the Insert Picture Dialog.
desc.detailed: An XML file which is used to create the Tree structure of left pane in the Insert Picture Dialog Box needs to be uploaded here. If XML has embeded resources then replace these resources with {#resourceName.extension#} e.g {#w02h3Dobry.jpg#} or {#treeContent.xml#} or {#initDoc.json#}. resourceName.extension must be the file name which you are going to upload.

rendererProperties.placeholder: Drop XML file here to upload

desc.basic: Images which are part of the XML file used to configure the Insert Picture Dialog.
desc.detailed: Image(s) which will be used to configure the Insert Picture Dialog, is/are required to be uploaded here. These images are referred in the Tree XML File.

desc.basic: ID of the item to be displayed selected in navigation pane of Dialog. [e.g. pictures in <node id='pictures'>]
desc.detailed: ID of the item in the left pane of the Insert File Dialog to be displayed as selected. This ID is present in the Tree XML.

desc.basic: Image to be shown in the address bar of Insert Picture Dialog.
desc.detailed: Image file which is used to show the address bar in Insert Picture Dialog. This image depends on the path of selected folder.

rendererProperties.placeholder: Drop Image file here to upload

desc.basic: Name of the image to be inserted. [e.g. skillsArtPhoto.jpg]
desc.detailed: Enter the name of the image which needs to be selected by the user in the dfialog. This name will be used for validation.

desc.basic: An HTML file, which will be used to configure the final state of Word Doc Area.
desc.detailed: An HTML file, which will be used to configure the final state of Word Doc Area in SIMS, is required to be uploaded here. This file can be generated by exporting the Word Document as HTML file after inserting required image. If HTML has embeded resources then replace these resources with {#resourceName.extension#} e.g {#w02h3Dobry.jpg#} or {#treeContent.xml#} or {#initDoc.json#}. resourceName.extension must be the file name which you are going to upload.

rendererProperties.placeholder: Drop HTML file here to upload

desc.basic: Images (if any) which are part of the HTML file used to configure the final state of Word Document Area.
desc.detailed: Image(s) which will be used to configure the Word Doc Area in SIMS, is/are required to be uploaded here. These images are generated while exporting the final word document as HTML file.

desc.basic: HTML ID of the image to be shown as selected in document. [e.g. Picture1 in
desc.detailed: ID which is present on the img tag of the image in final HTML document needs to be entered. This image will be shown as selected after insertion in document.
